DOC.brief_title: A Phase I , Open-Label , Single-Center Study Assess Absorption , Metabolism , Excretion 14C-AZD3293
DOC.detailed_description: This study open-label , non-randomized , absorption , metabolism , excretion study evaluate mass balance , metabolite profile , rate route elimination [ 14C ] -AZD3293 derive metabolite follow administration single 100-mg ( contain approximately 150 µCi ) oral dose ( oral solution ) follow least 8-hour fast food ( include water ) . Seven healthy male subject enrol study single study site complete minimum 6 subject . The study consist 2 visit .
